mapper.select:
select user_id as id, user_password as password, user_name as name, user_email as email, user_phone_number as phone, user_birth as birth, user_created_date as createdDate, user_deleted_date as deletedDate, user_lock_date as lockDate, user_point as point, user_status as status, coupon_no as CouponNo, wishlist_no as wishNo, user_role_type as roleType, grade_no as gradeNo, user_iskakao as isKakao
from cinemabox_users where user_id = #{value}

select user_id as id, user_password as password, user_name as name, user_email as email, user_phone_number as phone, user_birth as birth, user_created_date as createdDate, user_deleted_date as deletedDate, user_lock_date as lockDate, user_point as point, user_status as status, coupon_no as CouponNo, wishlist_no as wishNo, user_role_type as roleType, grade_no as gradeNo, user_iskakao as isKakao
from cinemabox_users where user_email = #{value}

select W.wishlist_no as wishlistNo, M.movie_no as movieNo, M.movie_thumbnail as movieThumbnail, M.movie_title as movieTitle, W.wishlist_created_date as wishlistCreatedDate
from cinemabox_wishlists W , cinemabox_movie M where W.movie_no = M.movie_no and W.user_id = #{value}

select CList.user_id as id, C.coupon_no as couponNo, C.coupon_type as couponType, C.coupon_exp_date as couponExpDate
from cinemabox_couponlist CList, cinemabox_coupons C where CList.coupon_no = C.coupon_no and C.COUPON_STATUS = 'N' and CList.user_id = #{value}

select R.reservation_no as reservationNo, M.movie_title as movieTitle, R.reservation_payment as reservationPayment, R.reservation_total_price as reservationPrice, R.reservation_created_date as reservationCreatedDate, R.reservation_point as reservationPoint from cinemabox_reservation R, cinemabox_movie M where R.movie_no = M.movie_no and R.user_id = #{value} order by reservation_created_date desc

select OL.order_no as orderNo, S.snack_name as name, OL.order_amount as orderAmount, OL.order_date as orderDate, (S.snack_price * OL.order_amount)as orderPrice from cinemabox_order_list OL, cinemabox_snack S where OL.snack_no = S.snack_no and OL.user_id = #{value} union select OL.order_no as orderNo, G.gift_name as name, OL.order_amount as orderAmount, OL.order_date as orderDate, (G.gift_price * OL.order_amount)as orderPrice from cinemabox_order_list OL, cinemabox_gifts G where OL.gift_no = G.gift_no and OL.user_id = #{value}
mapper.insert: insert into cinemabox_users (user_id, user_password, user_name, user_email, user_birth, user_phone_number, user_address) values (#{id}, #{password}, #{name}, #{email}, TO_DATE(#{birth},'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{phone}, #{address})
mapper.update: update cinemabox_users set user_password = #{password}, user_email = #{email}, user_phone_number = #{phone}, user_address = #{address} where user_id = #{value}
mapper.select: select count(*) from cinemabox_couponlist CList, cinemabox_coupons C where CList.coupon_no = C.coupon_no and C.COUPON_STATUS = 'N' and CList.user_id = #{value}
select count(*) from CINEMABOX_WISHLISTS where user_id=#{value}
